reviews.review_msg: This prof is a real disaster. I agree with prev. posts. I have spoken with my friends, who took this course before: it should be one of the most interesting courses. But  unfortunately it is not. Avoid this "Prof" is possible.

Course taken: Math 309 (not appearing under RMP course list). Very little material given to work with. Good lectures, but solutions to homework skip steps and often don't give answers. Lecture notes are messy and are often unclear. Seems hostile in correspondence.
This prof kept making mistakes in class.
